content:
Automatically Trigger an Action Based on a Conversation Intelligence Signal.

Create a rule in Salesforce that triggers an action based on intelligence signals defined in your telephony system. Service Cloud Voice offers multiple options for creating rules. 

To subscribe to intelligence signals and trigger actions, create a rule based on a Next Best Action or autolaunched flow. For example, pass the detected signal to a Recommendation Strategy flow and link the flow to the Einstein Next Best Action component in a Lightning page.

Create a Custom Component to Trigger an Action

Pass the detected signal to a Recommendation Strategy flow and link the flow to the Einstein Next Best Action component in a Lightning page.
title: Creating Custom Conversation Intelligence Rules in Service Cloud
